name: 2 Bit Runner
description:
A quick 12 hour submission for Pirate Software's 7th Game Jam.
-> https://develop.games/gamejam/

Credits : Me, I did everything.

Tools Used :

  1. Godot : https://godotengine.org/
    1. Godot SFXR Plug-in : https://github.com/tomeyro/godot-sfxr
  2. Aesprite : https://www.aseprite.org/

Special thanks to Thor of Pirate Software (https://gopiratesoftware.com/) for hosting the jam and having amazing streams.
